TopicTitle: Does the Debug Toolbar still work in .21?

Articles.Content:
I saw a thread stating when they did ALT+F12, they got an error about something missing. I just want to know if anyone managed to get the Debug Toolbar to work in .21, and managed to activate the cheats and they still work?

Edited July 25, 2013 by Benie
I'm not having any issue with part clipping or infinite fuel... The best answer would be, press alt + f12 and find out for yourself!
I got the debug toolbar, so yes, it should work.
